participant_1.name: Emma Johnson
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, Emma often expresses her feelings through art and writing.
participant_1.background: She comes from a supportive family that encourages her to pursue her interests in literature and design.

participant_2.name: Liam Smith
participant_2.personality: Straightforward and a bit sarcastic, Liam tends to speak his mind and often uses humor to cope with stress.
participant_2.background: Liam enjoys sports and is part of the school's soccer team, balancing academics and athletics.
